import React from 'react'; import './navbar.css'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import { useLocation ,useNavigate} from 'react-router-dom' function NavBar() { const location = useLocation() const userName = location.state?.userName || 'Account' const userId = location.state?.userId console.log(userId); const navigate = useNavigate() // const handleCart =()=>{ // navigate(`/menu/add-to-cart/${userId}`) // } return (
Icon Location
  • Search
  • Offers
  • Help
  • {userName}
    • Profile
    • Orders
    • {userName === 'Account' ? 'Login' : 'Logout'}
    • Cart
) } export default NavBar
